basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Pam Plunkett Kuzminski Student Teacher Award
basic_information.scholarship_notes: Eligible for full disbursement during student teaching semester fall or spring.
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. Pam Kuzminski Student Teacher Award

description: ?Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Education Professional Studies majoring in Elementary Education. Eligibility Requirements Must be declared major in Early Childhood or Elementary Education Min 3.0 GPA Preference given to eligible ELED applicants Provide transcript Eligible for full disbursement during student teaching semester - fall or spring. Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipient must write a thank you letter to the scholarship donor
